00029 #include "brisadevicexmlhandlercp.h"
00030 #include "brisacontrolpointdevice.h"
00031 
00032 #define PORT_INDEX 2
00033 
00034 using namespace BrisaUpnp;

00036 BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP::~BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP() {
00037 }
00038 
00039 void BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP::parseDevice(BrisaControlPointDevice *device,
00040         QTemporaryFile *tmp) {
00041     QDomDocument document("Device");
00042     document.setContent(tmp);
00043     QDomElement element = document.documentElement();
00044     if (element.tagName() != "root")
00045         return;
00046     QDomNode n = element.firstChild();
00047     while (!n.isNull()) {
00048         element = n.toElement();
00049         if (element.tagName() == "specVersion") {
00050             QString major = element.elementsByTagName("major").at(0).toElement().text();
00051             QString minor = element.elementsByTagName("minor").at(0).toElement().text();
00052             if (major.isEmpty() || minor.isEmpty())
00053                 return;
00054             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::Major, major);
00055             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::Minor, minor);
00056         } else if (element.tagName() == "device") {
00057             QString udn = element.elementsByTagName("UDN").at(0).toElement().text();
00058             QString friendlyName = element.elementsByTagName("friendlyName").at(0).toElement().text();
00059             QString deviceType = element.elementsByTagName("deviceType").at(0).toElement().text();
00060             QString manufacturer = element.elementsByTagName("manufacturer").at(0).toElement().text();
00061             QString manufacturerURL = element.elementsByTagName("manufacturerURL").at(0).toElement().text();
00062             QString modelName = element.elementsByTagName("manufacturer").at(0).toElement().text();
00063             QString modelNumber = element.elementsByTagName("modelNumber").at(0).toElement().text();
00064             QString modelURL = element.elementsByTagName("modelURL").at(0).toElement().text();
00065             QString serialNumber = element.elementsByTagName("serialNumber").at(0).toElement().text();
00066             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::Udn, udn);
00067             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::FriendlyName, friendlyName);
00068             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::DeviceType, deviceType);
00069             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::Manufacturer, manufacturer);
00070             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::ManufacturerUrl, manufacturerURL);
00071             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::ModelName, modelName);
00072             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::ModelNumber, modelNumber);
00073             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::ModelUrl, modelURL);
00074             device->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::SerialNumber, serialNumber);
00075 
00076             QDomNodeList serviceList = element.elementsByTagName("serviceList");
00077             if (serviceList.size() > 0) {
00078                 QDomNodeList services = serviceList.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("service");
00079                 for (int i = 0; i < services.size(); i++) {
00080                     QString serviceType = services.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("serviceType").at(0).toElement().text();
00081                     QString serviceId = services.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("serviceId").at(0).toElement().text();
00082                     QString controlURL = services.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("controlURL").at(0).toElement().text();
00083                     QString eventSubURL = services.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("eventSubURL").at(0).toElement().text();
00084                     QString SCPDURL = services.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("SCPDURL").at(0).toElement().text();
00085 
00086                     BrisaControlPointService *service = new BrisaControlPointService(serviceType, serviceId, SCPDURL, controlURL, eventSubURL, "");
00087 
00088                     QStringList urlBase = device->getAttribute(BrisaControlPointDevice::UrlBase).split(":");
00089                     if (urlBase.size() > PORT_INDEX) {
00090                         QString port = urlBase[PORT_INDEX];
00091                         QString newPort = "";
00092                         quint8 index = 0;
00093                         while (port[index].isDigit()) {
00094                             newPort.append(port[index]);
00095                             index++;
00096                         }
00097                         urlBase[PORT_INDEX] = newPort;
00098                         while (urlBase.size() > PORT_INDEX + 1) urlBase.pop_back();
00099                     }
00100 
00101                     BrisaServiceFetcher f(service, urlBase.join(":") + service->
00102                               getAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::ScpdUrl));
00103 
00104 
00105                     if (!f.fetch()) {
00106                         device->addService(service);
00107                     } else {
00108                         // TODO handle error
00109                         qWarning() << "Failed to dowload service XML.";
00110                     }
00111                 }
00112             }
00113 
00114             QDomNodeList iconList = element.elementsByTagName("iconList");
00115             if (iconList.size() > 0) {
00116                 QDomNodeList icons = iconList.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("icon");
00117                 for (int i = 0; i < icons.size(); i++) {
00118                     QString mimetype = icons.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("mimetype").at(0).toElement().text();
00119                     QString width = icons.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("width").at(0).toElement().text();
00120                     QString height = icons.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("height").at(0).toElement().text();
00121                     QString depth = icons.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("depth").at(0).toElement().text();
00122                     QString url = icons.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("url").at(0).toElement().text();
00123 
00124                     device->addIcon(new BrisaIcon(mimetype, width, height, depth, url));
00125                 }
00126             }
00127 
00128             QDomNodeList deviceList = element.elementsByTagName("deviceList");
00129             for (int i = 0; i < deviceList.size(); i++) {
00130                 //TODO parse devices;
00131             }
00132         }
00133         n = n.nextSibling();
00134     }
00135 }
